<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we have no current ranges just add the range and return, otherwise,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// check the current section and CU against the previous section and CU we</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1310"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Attach DW&#95;AT&#95;call&#95;tail&#95;call to tail calls for standards compliance.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1311"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfunit-2/#ae6243db70660a7d705bd1c739c49cc6b">addFlag</a>(CallSiteDIE, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfcompileunit-2/#ab5146bedc026123984b5193c0a6e94af">getDwarf5OrGNUAttr</a>(dwarf::DW&#95;AT&#95;call&#95;tail&#95;call));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1312"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1313"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Attach the address of the branch instruction to allow the debugger to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1314"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// show where the tail call occurred. This attribute has no GNU analog.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1315"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1316"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// GDB works backwards from non-standard usage of DW&#95;AT&#95;low&#95;pc (in DWARF4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1317"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mode -- equivalently, in DWARF5 mode, DW&#95;AT&#95;call&#95;return&#95;pc) at tail-call</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1318"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// site entries to figure out the PC of tail-calling branch instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1319"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This means it doesn&#39;t need the compiler to emit DW&#95;AT&#95;call&#95;pc, so we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1320"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// don&#39;t emit it here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1321"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1322"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There&#39;s no need to tie non-GDB debuggers to this non-standardness, as it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1323"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// adds unnecessary complexity to the debugger. For non-GDB debuggers, emit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1324"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the standard DW&#95;AT&#95;call&#95;pc info.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1325"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfcompileunit-2/#a021658afc8b95fca777f7f6ebc36aa8c">useGNUAnalogForDwarf5Feature</a>())</span></CodeLine>
